alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; West Central Mountains; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued December 16 at 9:12AM MST until December 18 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...An extended period of stagnant air, with light winds and little vertical mixing. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest and west central Idaho and northeast and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: An Air Stagnation Advisory concerns itself with meteorological conditions only. For more information on air pollution in Idaho, visit website www.deq.idaho.gov. For Oregon, visit website www.oregon.gov/deq. If possible, reduce or eliminate activities that contribute to air pollution, such as outdoor burning, and the use of residential wood burning devices. Reduce vehicle trips and vehicle idling as much as possible.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; West Central Mountains; Western Magic Valley
